title: Bard's Lore
body:
Riot said they were going to get rid of the League, the institutes and everything. Is Bard's lore connected to that somehow?
The league and the institutes are the structure of the game and practically the universe of it, he feels it is threatened so he came but he doesn't save it... he just feels something in the structure of the universe (the league) is being changed so he comes??? :< Am I close at least?

replies.body: smh.. riot stop trying to fix stuff that arent broken. we love the lore ;o
Same here, I don't know why they even changed it in the first place.
They didn't say there were getting rid of it and all that, that was some troll guy. But if they did and I never found it link us a source

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/creative-spotlight/dev-blog-exploring-runeterra

Read "where are we today"

They essentially deleted all the lore to do with the actual League of Legends and made it non-canon.

Honestly their story telling just went more down hill with this decision from what i've seen and it's simply "lets create pretty videos instead of actual story."

EDIT: And as a note, this is from 7 months ago, and no backtrack on this decision was made even with the massive amount of backlash it recieved (the comments from riot are all like -300 or worse) so they are sticking this shitty path out.

so basicly they scrapped the game, seeing as it was called League of Legends, after the lores being based on the League Of Legends, also referred to as the institute, to peruse a runeterra lore based. Might as rename the game "Legends of Runeterra while they are at it.

Pretty much.

League of legend's as is, makes no fucking sense.

Rito's reason?

Laziness (honestly how hard is it to do a League judgement? instead we only get videos cause that's all they can be fucked with instead of a fluid world that makes sense.)
